name: PathParameterSchemaDiffTest
description: Tests for differences in path parameters and schemas in OpenAPI documents.

test_cases.name: pathSamePathParamsDiffParamSameAsInPathButSchemaDiff
test_cases.description: Tests the scenario where the path is the same but the path parameters are different, parameters in the `Parameters` section match the path parameter, but the schema is different.

test_cases.name: pathSamePathParamsDiffParamNameDiffSchemaSame
test_cases.description: Tests the scenario where the path is the same but the path parameters are different, parameters in the `Parameters` section match the path parameter, and the schema is the same.
